name: Naturetherapy
body:
### Welcome to Nature Therapy. 
Share nature ways to prevent sickness and improve healthy.

### Food Therapy
Food can be medicines or poison. The most important thing is to choose the right food for your health condition. Find therapies here to boot energy, clean intestines and stomach and etc. 
'Moderate and Variety is a golden line.'

### Meridian
Human body is too complexity for modern medical science to decrypt all, especially its self-heal ability. Meridian is one of the ancient self heal way by stimulate reflecting points. It doesn't heal as effectively as medical pills and has its limitation, but it does its own good for treating human body as a whole. . 


### Yoga/Taiji
Exercise heals if you do it properly.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
